thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Justin

author: Justin
title: Justin
text:
I had booked a flight from London to Melbourne(Australia) via HongKong .I Needed to change my flight so I could stop in HongKong for 4 days. The gentleman on the ph did his upmost to get me the best deal possible. It worked out more expensive than the the original flight. So he suggested I let my flight go from HongKong to Melbourne and book a oneway flight from HongKong to Melbourne. It work out so much cheaper. Great work, keep up the cheap flights.
Thank you flight network.
